sentences.en: In order that training should be effective it must be planned systematically.
sentences.cn: 为使培训有成效，必须有系统的计划。

sentences.en: Selective schools don't systematically employ better instructional approaches than less selective schools.
sentences.cn: 精英学校并没有系统地采用比普通学校更好的教学方法。

sentences.en: Teachers must think systematically about their practice and learn from experience, seeking the advice of others and drawing on education research and scholarship to improve their practice.
sentences.cn: 教师必须系统地思考实践，吸取经验，虚心求教，借鉴教育研究和学术成果，提高实践水平。
